page.title: 15LIFE-STYLES IN GENERAL
page.content: Most of the people in this area go to Church regularly, every Sunday. Not many people go to discos or night- clubs. The old people in the area of Hatton Green like to be sociable and enjoy spending their money, playing cards and gambling.While most of the people stay in in the evening, the old tend to go for short strolls. Only the children and teenagers are in fashion. Children spend most of their time out of doors, playing around on the farm or out in the countryside. Teenagers spend most of their time at discos and in Warwick and Leamington. There are no punks or people with weird hairstyles.
